keyMappings:
map gp togglePinTab
map <c-m> toggleMuteTab
map gm LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue
map gx closeOtherTabs
map g< closeTabsOnLeft
map g> closeTabsOnRight


unmap <a-p>		
unmap <a-m>
searchEngines:
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
r: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s+site%3Areddit.com Reddit
v: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
gh: https://github.com/Harshkumar77?tab=repositories&q=%s&type=&language=&sort= My Repo
G: https://www.google.com/search?q=site%3Agithub.com+%20 GitHub
npm: https://www.npmjs.com/search?q=%s NPM
l: http://locahost:%s Localhost
L: http://127.0.0.1:%s 127.0.0.1
learn: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=site%3Alearnxinyminutes.com+%s&ia=web=&safesearch=0&categories=general LearnXinYmin
psql: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=site%3Awww.postgresqltutorial.com+%s&ia=web PSQL
nix: https://search.nixos.org/packages?channel=24.05&from=0&size=50&sort=relevance&type=packages&query=%s NIX
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
gi: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&udm=2 Google Images
wd: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s+site%3Abritannica.com+OR+site%3Awikipedia.org+OR+site%3Aphilpapers.org wiki
w: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s+site%3Abritannica.com+OR+site%3Asimple.wikipedia.org wiki simple
anna: https://annas-archive.org/search?index=&page=1&q=%s&display=&ext=pdf&sort=
